</entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：继续 – 开源编码自动驾驶仪</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/continuedev/继续</id>; <更新>;2023-07-26T20:26:52.857792Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/continuedev/continue"/>; <作者>; <名称>;sestinj</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=sestinj</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com /6277dfc2dade35415fed44127288ab91343e3e6c914f313c51140cafc718931b/continuedev/继续" style="宽度：220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;Continue 是一个用于软件开发的开源自动驾驶仪，它将 ChatGPT 的强大功能引入您的 IDE。它需要 Python 3.8 或更高版本。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat .io/#show-hn-continue-open-source-coding-autopilot" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id= 36882146" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type=" text">;Overture 地图基金会发布开放地图数据集</stitle>; <id>;https://overturemaps.org/overture-maps-foundation-releases-first-world-wide-open-map-dataset/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-26T16:26:52.858785Z</更新>; <link href="https://overturemaps.org/overture-maps-foundation-releases-first-world-wide-open-map-dataset/" />; <author>; <name>;chippy</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=chippy</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src ="https://overturemaps.org/wp-content/uploads/sites/16/2023/07/overture_places-1024x641.png" style="宽度：220px； height: 138px;" />;<br />;Overture 地图基金会发布了第一个开放地图数据集，其中包括全球近 6000 万个地点的四层开放地图数据。该数据集将成为导航和定位的基础元素 -基于应用程序。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#overture-maps-foundation-releases-open-map-dataset" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href= "https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36879461" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews .betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;心灵手榴弹</stitle>; <id>;https://www.fourmilab.ch/webtools/MindGrenade/</id>; <更新>;2023- 07-26T22:26:52.859749Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.fourmilab.ch/webtools/MindGrenade/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;nano17c </名称>; <uri>;https： //news.ycombinator.com/user?id=nano17c</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.fourmilab.ch/webtools/MindGrenade/figures/ mind_grenade_01.png" style="width: 220px;高度：165px;" />;<br />;Harry S. Pyle 是一位才华横溢的工程师和电子奇才，为数字电子领域做出了重大贡献。他以提出原创想法的能力和业余爱好者的专业知识而闻名。收音机。他的著名创作之一是心灵手榴弹，这是一种手持电子设备，可以生成随机音乐，并且设计简单。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#mind-grenade" target="_blank ">;[summary]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;培养一种状态新想法诞生的心灵</stitle>; <id>;https://www.henrikkarlsson.xyz/p/good-ideas</id>; <updated>;2023-07-26T19:26:52.860684Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.henrikkarlsson.xyz/p/good-ideas"/>; <作者>; <name>;savagejohn</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id =savagejohn</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_120,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https %3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F4697c31d-2502-48d2-b6c1-11e5ea97536f_2560x2174.jpeg" style="width: 220px; height: 187px;" />;<br />;2010年代初，为初创公司创始人提供联合办公空间和共享生活的想法很流行。然而，Y Combinator总裁Sam Altman认为，不提供联合办公空间实际上有帮助培养伟大的想法。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#cultivating-a-state-of-mind-where-new-ideas-are-born" target="_blank">;[summary]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36883436" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;出售车牌位置和分析数据的数据经纪人</stitle>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/#data-brokers- sell-license-plate-location-and-analytics-data" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator .com/item?id=36881133" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml ">; <title type="text">;剖析 Google 的网络环境完整性规范</stitle>; <id>;https://vivaldi.com/blog/googles-new-dangerous-web-environment-integrity-spec/</id >; <更新>;2023-07-26T17:26:52.863725Z</更新>; <link href="https://vivaldi.com/blog/googles-new-dangerous-web-environment-integrity-spec/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;dagurp </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=dagurp</uri>; </作者>; <content type =“html”>;<img src =“ https://vivaldi.com/wp-content/uploads/Toxic_google-980x551.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;Google 正在制定新的网络环境完整性规范，该规范引起了争议。该规范旨在为网站提供 API 来确定所使用的浏览器和平台是否可信。但是，提议的解决方案被认为很糟糕，并且已与网站的 DRM 进行了比较。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#unpacking-googles-web-environment-integrity-specification" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36875940" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;可视化世界上的每项工作</stitle>; <id>;https://duarteocarmo.com/blog /every-job-world</id>; <更新>;2023-07-26T21:26:52.864843Z</更新>; <link href="https://duarteocarmo.com/blog/every-job-world"/>; <作者>; <名称>;surprisetalk</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=surprisetalk</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src=" https://duarteocarmo.com/images/36/every-job-world.png" style="width: 220px; height: 127px;" />;<br />;欧盟通过 ESCO 项目迎接了将世界上每个职位分为 10 类的挑战。通过抓取 3001 种职业的数据库并使用 BERT 模型，建立了一个网络已创建的职位按相似性对职位进行聚类。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#visualizing-every-job-in-the-world" target="_blank">;[summary]</ a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36876556" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base= "https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;“它在我的机器中运行”如何变成“它在我的容器中运行”</stitle>; <id>;https: //dwdraju.medium.com/how-it-works-in-my-machine-turns-it-works-in-my-container-1b9a340ca43d</id>; <更新>;2023-07-26T22:26:52.865954Z </更新>; <link href="https://dwdraju.medium.com/how-it-works-in-my-machine-turns-it-works-in-my-container-1b9a340ca43d"/>; <作者>; <name>;lis</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=lis</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// /miro.medium.com/v2/resize:fit:1358/1*QBuagr7tdmL-Gso3D70cPg.png" style="width: 220px; height: 118px;" />;<br />;本文讨论了代码中断时说“它可以在我的容器中运行”的常见问题。它强调了跟踪映像版本、对 docker-compose 文件进行版本控制以及管理环境的重要性它还提到了在 Dockerfile 中进行自定义和包版本控制、处理文件所有权以及解决 MacOS 和 Linux 之间文件系统差异的需要。本文最后提到了与端口冲突和代理使用相关的潜在问题。<a href=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-it-works-in-my-machine-turns-to-it-works-in-my-container" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36885598" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;人们过分强调“减少、再利用、回收”的回收方面</stitle>; <id>;https://futurism。 com/the-byte/scientists-recycling-backfired</id>; <更新>;2023-07-26T11:26:52.866917Z</更新>; <link href="https://futurism.com/the-byte/scientists -recycling-backfired"/>; <作者>; <名称>;gsky</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=gsky</uri>; </author>; <content type="html ">;<img src="https://futurism.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwp-assets.futurism.com%2F2023%2F07%2Fscientists-recycling-backfired.jpg&w=2048&q=75 “样式=”宽度：220px; height: 116px;" />;<br />;回收活动掩盖了生产过剩的问题，并淡化了其他减少废物的策略。许多人错误地认为回收一张出狱卡，导致混乱以及日益严重的废物生产灾难。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#people-over-emphasize-the-recycling-aspect-of-reduce-reuse-recycle" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36873516" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;《儿童在线安全法案》仍然对我们的在线权利构成威胁</stitle>; <id>;https:// /www.eff.org/deeplinks/2023/05/kids-online-safety-act-still-huge-danger-our-rights-online</id>; <更新>;2023-07-26T21:26:52.870193Z< /更新>; <link href="https://www.eff.org/deeplinks/2023/05/kids-online-safety-act-still-huge-danger-our-rights-online"/>; <作者>; <名称>;leotravis10</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=leotravis10</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// www.eff.org/files/banner_library/student-privacy-og.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;国会已重新提出《儿童在线安全法案》(KOSA)，并进行了修改，但仍引起担忧。该法案将加强监控、限制信息获取，并引入审查工具在州总检察长手中，危及年轻人的在线权利和安全。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#kids-online-safety-act-is-still-a-danger- to-our-rights-online" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36885040" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;MOS 6502 非法操作码如何工作< /stitle>; <id>;https://www.pagetable.com/?p=39</id>; <更新>;2023-07-26T11:26:52.871137Z</更新>; <link href="https:// www.pagetable.com/?p=39"/>; <作者>; <名称>;hasheddan</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=hasheddan</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.weihenstephan.org/~michaste/pagetable/6502/6502_small.png" style="width: 220px; height: 271px;" />;<br />;MOS 6502 的原始 NMOS 版本用于 Commodore 64、Apple II 和任天堂娱乐系统 (NES) 等计算机，因其非法操作码而闻名。这些操作码虽然未由架构定义，但仍然可以执行有用的功能。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-mos-6502-illegal-opcodes-work" target="_blank">;[summary ]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36875816" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;稳定扩散 XL 1.0</stitle>; <id>;https://techcrunch.com/2023/07/ 26/stability-ai-releases-its-latest-image-generating-model-stable-diffusion-xl-1-0/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-26T17:26:52.872089Z</更新>; <链接 href="https://techcrunch.com/2023/07/26/stability-ai-releases-its-latest-image-generate-model-stable-diffusion-xl-1-0/"/>; <作者>; <name>;gslin</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=gslin</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// /techcrunch.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/064.jpg?w=600" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;Stability AI 发布了 Stable Diffusion XL 1.0，这是迄今为止最先进的文本到图像模型。与之前的模型相比，该模型可提供鲜艳且准确的颜色、更好的对比度、阴影和照明。它可以在几秒钟内生成完整的 1 兆像素分辨率图像，并且可自定义以微调概念和样式。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#stable-diffusion-xl-1-0" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36880756" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content >; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;BasicBlocker：ISA 重新设计，使 Spectre-Immune CPU 更快 (2021)< /stitle>; <id>;https://arxiv.org/abs/2007.15919</id>; <更新>;2023-07-26T18:26:52.873016Z</更新>; <link href="https://arxiv.org /abs/2007.15919"/>; <作者>; <名称>;PaulHoule</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=PaulHoule</uri>; </author>; <content type="html ">;<img src="https://static.arxiv.org/static/browse/0.3.4/images/arxiv-logo-fb.png" style="宽度：220px; height: 129px;" />;<br />;最近的研究揭示了越来越多的微架构攻击，这些攻击利用推测执行（现代处理器的标准功能）。建议和部署的对策涉及各种编译器更新、固件更新和硬件更新。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#basicblocker-isa-redesign-to-make-spectre-immune-cpus-faster-2021" target="_blank">;[摘要]</ a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36881989" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base= "https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;太多的白日梦对我有多大影响</stitle>; <id>;https://sunghoyahng.substack.com/p/how -太多白日梦受影响</id>; <更新>;2023-07-26T13:26:52.874158Z</更新>; <link href="https://sunghoyahng.substack.com/p/how-too- much-daydreaming-affected"/>; <author>; <name>;SunghoYahng</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=SunghoYahng</uri>; </author>; <content type=" html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/f_auto,q_auto:best,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsunghoyahng.substack.com%2Ftwitter%2Fsubscribe-card.jpg% 3Fv%3D323842631%26version%3D9" style="宽度：220px;高度：115px;" />;<br />;我相信我正在经历一种称为适应不良白日梦 (MD) 的认知现象。它尚未得到官方认可，但它极大地影响了我的生活和生产力。我的白日梦无处不在，并打断了我的日常任务，很难保持专注。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-too-much-daydreaming-affected-me" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36860570" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;举报人告诉国会美国正在隐瞒“数十年”的 UFO 捕获计划</stitle>; <id>;https://www.washingtonpost。 com/politics/2023/07/26/ufos-uaps-congress-whistleblower-spy-aliens/01081d9a-2bce-11ee-a948-a5b8a9b62d84_story.html</id>; <更新>;2023-07-26T23:26:52.875086Z </更新>; <link href="https://www.washingtonpost.com/politics/2023/07/26/ufos-uaps-congress-whistleblower-spy-aliens/01081d9a-2bce-11ee-a948-a5b8a9b62d84_story.html "/>; <author>; <name>;ricksunny</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ricksunny</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.washingtonpost.com/wp-apps/imrs.php?src=https://arc-anglerfish-washpost-prod-washpost.s3.amazonaws.com/public/MZKOF2BL2EI65KKIUW4KTNRNQQ_size-normalized.jpg&w =1440"样式="宽度：220px；高度：147px;" />;<br />;据一位前空军情报官员称，美国正在隐瞒一项长期计划，该计划旨在检索和逆向工程不明飞行物。五角大楼否认了这些说法。<a href="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/#whistleblower-tells-congress-us-is-concealing-multi-decade-ufo-capture-program" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https ://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36886259" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;人们为软件付费的世界</stitle>; <id>;https://1sub.dev/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-26T11 :26:52.875992Z</updated>; <link href="https://1sub.dev/"/>; <作者>; <name>;robalni</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user ?id=robalni</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;软件开发必须以某种方式获得资金。1Sub.dev 试图通过让开发者合作来为用户提供更多的资金来解决这个问题。<a href ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-world-where-people-pay-for-software" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news .ycombinator.com/item?id=36875513" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed .xml">; <title type="text">;模具2.0</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/rui314/mold/releases/tag/v2.0.0</id>; <更新>;2023-07 -26T13:26:52.876912Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/rui314/mold/releases/tag/v2.0.0"/>; <作者>; <名称>;fomine3</名称>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=fomine3</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/afd44f1e96aebe8e924c22adeefc6fc7c2e1d9a3707116804f162bb6a567c4c1/ rui314/mold/releases/tag/v2.0.0" style="width: 220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;Mold 2.0.0 是我们高速链接器的新主要版本。为了扩大我们的用户群，我们已将许可证从 AGPL 转换为 MIT。<a href="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/#mold-2-0" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36876783" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text" >;科学家在佛罗里达群岛发现新的等足类动物物种</stitle>; <id>;https://phys.org/news/2023-07-scientists-isopod-species-florida-keys.html</id>; <更新>;2023 -07-26T17:26:52.877901Z</更新>; <link href="https://phys.org/news/2023-07-scientists-isopod-species-florida-keys.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;wglb</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=wglb</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// scx1.b-cdn.net/csz/news/800a/2023/scientists-discover-ne-5.jpg" style="width: 220px;高度：146px;" />;<br />;一个国际科学家小组在佛罗里达群岛发现了一种新的海洋隐动物物种。新发现的物种，Gnathia jimmybuffetti，是甲壳类等足类动物的成员。< a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#scientists-discover-new-isopod-species-in-the-florida-keys" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href= "https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36871446" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews .betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;内存复制狩猎</stitle>; <id>;https://tigerbeetle.com/blog/2023-07-26-copy-hunting/</ id>; <更新>;2023-07-26T12:26:52.878842Z</更新>; <link href="https://tigerbeetle.com/blog/2023-07-26-copy-hunting/"/>; <作者>; <name>;polyrand</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=polyrand</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// /tigerbeetle.com/assets/matklad.webp" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;LLVM IR 是理解和优化代码的强大工具。它提供了接近汇编语言的低级代码表示，同时还具有使其更高级的功能以人为本。通过分析 LLVM IR，开发人员可以识别和优化性能问题，例如隐式内存复制和不必要的代码重复。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#memory-copy-hunting" target= "_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36876396" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; < /entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;苹果对 App Store 规则的严格程度臭名昭著，却给了微信免费通行证（2020）< /stitle>; <id>;https://reclaimthenet.org/apple-app-store-wechat-c​​hina</id>; <更新>;2023-07-26T18:26:52.879777Z</更新>; <link href="https ://reclaimthenet.org/apple-app-store-wechat-c​​hina"/>; <author>; <name>;spenvo</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=spenvo</ uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://reclaimthenet.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/wechat.png" style="width: 220px; height: 152px;" />;<br />;苹果对 iPhone 的要求非常严格，决定用户可以运行哪些应用程序。然而，他们似乎对中国的微信应用程序破例，该应用程序通过传播小程序。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#apple-s-inknownly-strict-on-app-store-rules-but-gives-wechat-a-free-pass-2020" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36882467" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content >; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;智能合约安全领域指南</stitle>; <id>;https:// /scsfg.io/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-26T16:26:52.880759Z</更新>; <link href="https://scsfg.io/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;dmuhs< /name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=dmuhs</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;智能合约安全领域指南是一个免费资源，旨在提供编写安全智能合约的知识、见解和最佳实践。它是独立、公正的，并且不需要个人信息即可访问。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#smart-contract-security-field-guide" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36879991" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;研究表明草甘膦会损害大黄蜂的学习</stitle>; <id>;https://phys.org/news/2023-07-glyphosate-impairs-bumblebees.html</id>; <更新>;2023-07-26T17:26:52.881702Z</更新>; <link href="https://phys.org/news/2023-07-glyphosate-impairs-bumblebees.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;PaulHoule</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=PaulHoule</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// scx1.b-cdn.net/csz/news/800a/2023/glyphosate-impairs-lea.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：96px；" />;<br />;康斯坦茨大学的生物学家发现，接触草甘膦的熊蜂会损害厌恶学习能力。这种学习障碍可能会增加觅食者的死亡率，并对群体的成功产生负面影响。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#study-shows-glyphosate-impairs-learning-in-bumblebees" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36880639" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;JEP 400：默认 UTF-8</stitle>; <id>;https://openjdk.org/jeps/400</id>; <更新>;2023- 07-26T16:26:52.882588Z</更新>; <link href="https://openjdk.org/jeps/400"/>; <作者>; <name>;znpy</name>; <uri>;https://news .ycombinator.com/user?id=znpy</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;指定 UTF-8 作为标准 Java API 的默认字符集。此更改可确保所有实现、操作系统、区域设置和配置之间的行为一致，从而使 Java 程序更具可预测性和可移植性。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#jep-400-utf-8-by-default" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36880069" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;一名撰稿人冒充通灵者骗取受害者 2 亿美元</stitle>; <id>;https://thewalrus.ca/the-greatest-scam-ever-书面/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-26T22:26:52.883494Z</更新>; <link href="https://thewalrus.ca/the-greatest-scam-ever-writing/"/>; <作者>; <name>;firstbase</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=firstbase</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https ://walrus-assets.s3.amazonaws.com/img/Untitled-1-1.jpg" style="宽度：220 像素；高度：147 像素；" />;<br />;蒙特利尔一名文案撰稿人冒充通灵者骗取受害者2亿美元。他利用挑衅性的文案来推销自助指南和心理服务，吸引了超过一百万人邮寄金钱以换取虚假承诺。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-copywriter-swindled-victims-out-of-200m-by-pretending-to-be-a-psychic" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36883668" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed >;
